document.full_text: south korean teen-ager noh seung-yul found the moat in front of the 18th green three times as he racked up an ugly 11 in the pga championship second round friday.
document.title: oh noh! south korean teenager racks up ugly 11
lines_and_colors: south korean teen-ager noh seung-yul found the moat in front of the 18th green three times as he racked up an ugly 11 in the pga championship second round friday.
